data.oai_dc:dc: Lab collected crossing data for CI strain of Drosophila pandora, used to evaluate Cytoplasmic Incompatibility. Data from two experiments (Jan 2014 and April 2014), showing the number of hatched/unhatched eggs collected and scored, and the number of male and female progeny collected and scored. Crosses where no mating occurred excluded for analysis but identified here for completeness.
